translated: The appearances of consciousness

original: de dag de yi skye mched ni //
analyzed: de dag de yi skye mched ni //

original: rnam pa gnyis su thub pas gsungs //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su thub pas gsungs //

original: de ltar gang zag bdag med par //
analyzed: de ltar gang zag bdag med par //

original: phra rab rdul du du ma'ang min //

original: de dag 'dus pa'ang ma yin te //
analyzed: de dag 'dus pa'ang ma yin te //

original: 'di ltar rdul phran mi 'grub phyir //

original: drug gis cig car sbyar ba na //

analyzed: phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur //

original: drug po dag ni go gcig na //

original: rdul phran sbyor ba med na ni //

translated: If there is no joining of the subtle particles,

original: cha shas yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: cha shas yod pa ma yin pas /

analyzed: de ni gcig tu mi rung ngo //

original: zin dang ma zan cig car med //
analyzed: zin dang ma zan cig car med //

analyzed: ris chad du mar gnas pa dang // mig gis mi sod phra ba'ang med //

original: de yang gang tshe de yi tshe //
analyzed: de yang gang tshe de yi tshe //

analyzed: dper na der snang rnam rig bzhin //

original: rnam par rig pa phan tshun des //
